Question: Brain of Materials AG CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Brain of Materials AG

Product: Material Selection AI Tool

- AI-supported tools for simplifying material selection process
- Aids both suppliers and brands/OEMs in thriving within a dynamic market environment
- Focus on enhancing efficiency and effectiveness in product development
- Expedite development processes and optimize material selection
- Enables precise and quick selection of the best materials for any project
